Definition: A manifestation of mutual assent between a number of parties
An action that one has to do
The act of compelling compliance with an obligation
An agreement that creates an obligation with an enforcement mechanism
A system for creating and enforcing contracts
An agreement recognized and enforced by the state, typically through a system of laws, courts, and police
An agreement written in code and implemented by a technical system such as a virtual world or blockchain
An agreement without an explicit enforcement mechanism, but which is often enforced through social norms or reputation management [2]
A digital representation of an n-person agreement, akin to a user account
The process of recording or representing an agreement, usually by a qualified authority
The process of submitting a registered agreement to an enforcement mechanism
